Text.Page:
My friend, I'm sending some scouts into Free Trader territory, but I need you to create a distraction. The collective has a number of noctenium extractors in the area. Disable a few of those—removing the extractor keys should suffice—and they will be too busy investigating to notice my scouts.

I'll reward you for each extractor key you bring back to me.

! Not everyone could complete a mission like that, so far into enemy territory. The Enlightened Union is honored to have you among its ranks, friend!

Today, you truly earned the title "hero."
